name: 2024 10th International Conference on Learning and Teaching
content: Publishing and Indexing: Submissions will be peer reviewed by technical program committee, and accepted full papers will be published into International Journal of Information and Education Technology (IJIET) or International Journal of Learning and Teaching (IJLT) based on the paper topic and quality. International Journal of Information and Education Technology (IJIET) ISSN: 2010-3689 Frequency: Monthly DOI: 10.18178/IJIET Abstracting/ Indexing: Scopus (Since 2019), INSPEC (IET), UGC-CARE List (India), CNKI, EBSCO, Electronic Journals Library, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc. Paper Template Downloading: http://www.iclt.org/IJIET\_template.doc International Journal of Learning and Teaching (IJLT) ISSN: 2377-2891(Print); 2377-2905(Online) Frequency: Quarterly DOI: 10.18178/ijlt Abstracting/Indexing: Google Scholar; Crossref, CNKI, etc. Paper Template Downloading:http://www.ijlt.org/uploadfile/2015/0828/20150828041207229.doc
